subject: Football
lead_paragraph: After pulling away for a convincing win over the Colts on Monday, the Titans (7-0) have a two-game lead in the A.F.C. and a four-game lead in their division.
snippet: After pulling away for a convincing win over the Colts on Monday, the Titans (7-0) have a two-game lead in the A.F.C. and a four-game lead in their division.
